alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Meagher, central Judith Basin and southeastern Cascade Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 145 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms along a line over the Little Belt Mountains. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Neihart and Utica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
